relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation b/l, No increased work of breathing
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, RUQ tenderness, palpable gallbladder, lower abdominal tenderness, normoactive bowel sounds
relevant_findings.extremities: No ___ edema, ___ warm and well perfused

CT Findings.lower_chest: Mild bibasilar atelectasis. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion.

abdominal.hepatobiliary: Gallbladder distended with circumferential wall thickening, hyperemia, and substantial surrounding fat stranding compatible with acute cholecystitis.
abdominal.spleen: Normal size and attenuation, unchanged curvilinear calcification.
abdominal.gastrointestinal: Extensive diverticulosis without evidence of inflammation.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild left intrahepatic biliary dilation is stable from prior CT.
